channel.title: Tier I on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tier I on Home

item.title: Tier I stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier I during update 6.0. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.0. On average, players played 11 battles.

item.title: Tier I Tanks
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows the tanks with the highest Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Cruiser Mk. II
item.description: Cruiser Mk. II is a British Tier I Light Tank. Player Population This graphs compare’s the tank’s player population by WR at Tier to other same tier Light Tanks. Relative WR vs.

item.title: T-26
item.description: T-26 is a Soviet Tier I Light Tank. Player Population This graphs compare’s the tank’s player population by WR at Tier to other same tier Light Tanks.
